amendment.description: To improve the bill with respect to review of program effectiveness.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2622 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2622 proposed by Senator Schatz for Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S5986; text: CR S5986) To improve the bill with respect to review of program effectiveness.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2622 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
